channel.title: Character
channel.description:
Well, it looks like alot of Character threads are going around, so... I may as well join the crowd. Please rate in an honest manner if you wish to rate.
My character is level 101 CB. I haven't played on him much at all in a long time. I've had work, school, hockey, family, etc... All that good stuff. I'll most likely quit once I get 99 fletching.
My Favorite Bank Tab: (EDIT: I got both Fire Capes on my own. No third party helper.) [IMG]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o48/Mod_Adam/FaveBankTab.jpg[/img]
My Usual Outfit: [IMG]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o48/Mod_Adam/EverydayLook.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i117.photobucket.com/albums/o48/Mod_Adam/Thankyou.jpg[/img]
*Note* - Please respect the fact that I would not like my username posted. If you by any means find it out, please keep it to yourself. I'm very apprehensive when it comes to people knowing my username. I understand that the TOS "should" stop any affiliates of Jagex from being on this site, but I'd just rather not risk it.
Thanks for taking a look at my character, all feedback is appreciated :) Adam

item.title: Character
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

We’re moving to the Upper half of tier 2. We’ll be playing all Tier one teams twice this season. 4 years ago, when I was a Freshman, our team was at the bottom of tier 3. We’ve come a long way.

Ontopic: I’ve removed my stats picture. If you want to know a certain stat level, just ask and I’ll be glad to let you know.

Read full topic

item.title: Character
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

casey.:

i thought you could only have one fire cape…

Jagex updated that awhile ago when someone found a bug with the Gravestones, you could die outside caves and lose Fire cape, get someone with 70+ Prayer to bless it, and you would have 60 minutes to complete Caves. Once you completed you would get a Fire cape, and if you completed it in under 60 minutes, your grave would still be there with the Fire cape on the ground, and you could pick it up, there you go 2 Fire capes.

So instead of Jagex having to fix it, they just made it unlimited amount you can have at once.

On-topic;

Nice account, pretty good for a person here at Mitb/Mscp I’d guess. Needs alot of work with stats though.

Read full topic

item.title: Character
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

I couldn’t play HD on my computer, but on my dads I could. My mobo’s stock graphics card was shit. I’ve built a new computer though… I had to return the Motherboard because it was defective, btu it should be back in 4 days. Cost me about $1500. All gaming parts

Read full topic
